data.title: Goa University, Goa's premier University, Post Graduation, PH.D, B.SC, M.SC, Research Facilities Study India programme.
data.meta_description: Goa University, Goa's premier University, Post Graduation, PH.D, B.SC,  M.SC, Research Facilities Study India programme.
data.text:
Vikasit Bharat Ka Mantra, Bharat ho Nashe se Swatantra

Social Work Discipline, D.D. Kosambi School of Social Sciences and Behavioural Studies (DDKSSSBS) in collaboration with Goa Business School (GBS) invites all for 78th Independence Day under the theme "Vikasit Bharat Ka Mantra, Bharat ho Nashe se Swatantra." Date & Time: 12 Aug 2024, 10:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.; Venue: FF-8, Lecture Hall Annexe, First Floor, Goa Business School. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.

Introduction to Philosophy of Science

Directorate of Visiting Research Professors Programme, D.D.Kosambi Chair Professor in Interdisciplinary Studies and School of Sanskrit, Philosophy and Indic Studies organising a two-credit course on "Introduction to Philosophy of Science" by Prof Dhruv Raina, D.D. Kosambi Chair Professor in Interdisciplinary Studies, Goa University. Date: 16-30 Aug 2024; Venue: D-VRPP Seminar Hall, Directorate Block, Goa University. Click on the 'Know More' below for details and registration.

Essay competition on "The Role of Students in Combating Ragging: Towards a Safer Academic Environment"

MPSLGPP is organising an Essay competition on "The Role of Students in Combating Ragging: Towards a Safer Academic Environment" in commemoration of anti-ragging week 12-18 Aug 2024. The last date of submission is 16 Aug 2024. The results will be declared on 19 Aug 2024. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.

Poster Making Competition on the occasion of 'Anti-Ragging Week'

SGSLL is organising a poster-making competition on the occasion of 'Anti-Ragging Week' on the theme "Unite Against Ragging". The last date to submit the poster is 16 Aug 2024. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.

Revitalizing Public Administration: Reforms for Efficiency and Effectiveness

The Public Administration Programme of MPSLGPP in collaboration with the Goa Institute of Public Administration and Rural Development (GIPARD), Goa, is organizing a Two Days State Level Seminar on 'Revitalizing Public Administration: Reforms for Efficiency and Effectiveness' on 26 - 27 Sep 2024. The last date for abstract submission is 20 Aug 2024. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.

Shakespeare & Theatre

The Discipline of English, SGSLL is organizing a Guest-lecture series on ‘Shakespeare & Theatre’ with renowned theatre personality and academician, Dr. Isabel Santa Rita Vas, Founder of The Mustard Seed Art Co. and recipient of the Goa State Cultural Award for Excellence in Drama. Dates: 12 Aug 2024 & 21 Aug 2024; Time: 11.00 am to 1.00 pm.; Venue: Seminar Hall, Faculty Block B, Goa University. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.

Workshop on 'Raman Spectroscopy'

School of Physical and Applied Sciences (SPAS) and School of Chemical Sciences (SCS) are organizing a two-day workshop on 'Raman Spectroscopy' under the PURSE grant. This workshop is mainly intended for research students in Physics, Chemistry, Life Sciences, and related fields. The workshop is also open to interested faculty members of the University, institutes, and colleges, as well as from the industry. Date: 26-27 Aug 2024; Venue: Chemistry Auditorium, School of Chemical Sciences, Block E, Goa University. The last date for Registration is 20 Aug 2024. Click on the 'Know More' below for details.
